name: konnect
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing Kong konnect cloud resources.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`konnect` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/csechrist/terraform-provider-konnect).

nodejs.packageDescription: A Pulumi package for creating and managing Kong konnect cloud resources.
nodejs.readme:
> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/csechrist/terraform-provider-konnect)
> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi-konnect` repo](https://github.com/csechrist/pulumi-konnect/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`terraform-provider-konnect` repo](https://github.com/csechrist/terraform-provider-konnect/issues).

python.readme:
> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/csechrist/terraform-provider-konnect)
> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi-konnect` repo](https://github.com/csechrist/pulumi-konnect/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`terraform-provider-konnect` repo](https://github.com/csechrist/terraform-provider-konnect/issues).

name.description: **(Required, String)** Name of header this route should require.

values.description: **(Required, List of String)** Allowed values this header should equal.

group.description: **(Required, String)** Identifier of an IdP group that is contained with OIDC ID token for groups claim

teamIds.description: **(Required, List of String)** Konnect teams that should map to this group.

configHash.description: **(String)** Hash of the current configuration state of node.

dataPlaneCertId.description: **(String)** Id of certificate used in communication between node and control plane.

lastPing.description: **(Integer)** Last time of ping of node.

provider.description:
The provider type for the konnect package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

basicAuthEnabled.description: **(Optional, Boolean)** Whether basic authentication is enabled.

idpMappingEnabled.description: **(Optional, Boolean)** Whether IDP mapping is enabled.

konnectMappingEnabled.description: **(Optional, Boolean)** Whether Konnect mapping is enabled.

oidcAuthEnabled.description: **(Optional, Boolean)** Whether OIDC authentication is enabled.

configAllJson.description: **(JSON)** The full configuration properties for the plugin, including all properties with their default values not specified in `config`.

configJson.description: **(Optional, JSON)** The configuration properties for the plugin which can be found on the plugins documentation page in the [Kong Plugin Hub](https://docs.konghq.com/hub/)

consumerId.description: **(Optional, String)** If set, the plugin will activate only for requests where the specified consumer has been authenticated.

controlPlaneId.description: **(Required, String)** The id of the control plane.

enabled.description: **(Optional, Boolean)** Whether the plugin is active. Default: `true`

instanceName.description: **(Optional, String)** The instance name of the plugin. Default: `-`

name.description: **(Required, String)** The name of the plugin which must match a valid installed plugin.

protocols.description: **(Optional, List of String)** A list of the request protocols that will trigger this plugin. Allowed values: `grpc`, `grpcs`, `http`, `https`, `tcp`, `tls`, `tls_passthrough`, `udp`, `ws`, `wss`

routeId.description: **(Optional, String)** If set, the plugin will only activate when receiving requests via the specified route.

serviceId.description: **(Optional, String)** If set, the plugin will only activate when receiving requests via one of the routes belonging to the specified service.

headers.description: **(Optional, set{header})** Configuration block for a header.  Can be specified multiple times for each header.  Each block supports the fields documented below.

hosts.description: **(Optional, List of String)** The hosts this route should allow.

httpsRedirectStatusCode.description: **(Optional, Integer)** The status code Kong responds with when all properties of a Route match except the protocol. Allowed values: `426`, `301`, `302`, `307`, `308`. Default: `426`

methods.description: **(Optional, List of String)** The methods this route should allow. Allowed values: `GET`, `PUT`, `POST`, `PATCH`, `DELETE`, `OPTIONS`, `HEAD`, `CONNECT`, `TRACE`

name.description: **(Optional, String)** The name of the route.

pathHandling.description: **(Optional, String)** Controls how the Service path, Route path and requested path are combined when sending a request to the upstream. Allowed values: `v0`, `v1`. Default: `v0`

paths.description: **(Optional, List of String)** The paths this route should allow.

preserveHost.description: **(Optional, Boolean)** Whether to use the request `Host` header during the Service request. Default: `false`

protocols.description: **(Optional, List of String)** The protocols this route should allow. Allowed values: `http`, `https`

regexPriority.description: **(Optional, Integer)** A number used to choose which route resolves a given request when several routes match it using regexes simultaneously. Default: `0`

requestBuffering.description: **(Optional, Boolean)** Whether to enable request body buffering. Default: `true`

responseBuffering.description: **(Optional, Boolean)** Whether to enable response body buffering. Default: `true`

serviceId.description: **(Optional, String)** The id of the service to forward traffic to.

stripPath.description: **(Optional, Boolean)** Whether to strip the matching prefix from the Service request. Default: `true`

inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getConsumer.

controlPlaneId.description: **(Required, String)** The id of the control plane containing consumer

customId.description: **(Optional, String)** The filter string to apply to the custom_id of the consumer. Uses equality.

searchCustomId.description: **(Optional, String)** The search string to apply to the custom_id of the consumer. Uses contains.

searchUsername.description: **(Optional, String)** The search string to apply to the username of the consumer. Uses contains.

username.description: **(Optional, String)** The filter string to apply to the username of the consumer. Uses equality.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getConsumer.

consumerId.description: **(String)** Id of the consumer alone
